channel.title: Anyone Know?
channel.description: Where i can get a good compiler?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 09:28:14 PM[/size][hr]anyone at all?

item.title: Anyone Know?
item.dc:creator: @roberson644 roberson644
item.description:
@roberson644 wrote:

lol just download a server source and edit the compiler, then delete whats there and just copy and paste this in it:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

but make the jdk1.6_02 what ever version of jdk you have, then just copy the compiler and stick it in your source… its the most basic but it works just fine u just run it then click run server. server sources can be downloaded in the server downloads section of the server development forum. for the run-server just copy and paste this:

@echo off@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

and do the same thing

Read full topic
